tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr was very helpful and understood my exact joint pain and treated me accordingly

tags: None
review: I recently visited an orthopedic specialist for a sprained wrist, and my experience was excellent. The doctor *** ************* *** took the time to explain the injury and treatment options clearly. The clinic's staff were friendly and efficient, making the whole process smooth. The treatment plan, including physical therapy, was effective, and I could see improvement within weeks. The orthopedic's expertise and caring approach made me feel confident in my recovery. Overall, I highly recommend this orthopedic clinic for anyone dealing with a sprain or any orthopedic issue. They provide top-notch care and support for their patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Kundgir, has been treating my family for the past 3 years. He is always very attentive and listens to the problem in detail before giving his diagnosis.  He always makes himself available in case of urgency. His approach is warm and he makes the patient feel relaxed, no matter how disturbing the medical issue is.  He recently treated my husband for intense pain in his shoulder. He treatment and practical advise helped my husband immensely .

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I do not recommended the doctor. Seems decision was made hastely by me, before doing proper research. Was fastened a temp plaster  to loosen up the swelling and was told to visit a few days later for a permanent cast. I was surprised that for a temporary plaster the fees  charged was quite high around 4k.so I was left to my imagination what the permanent cast would have cost for 2nd time. So I took a second opinion and had redone the cast from somewhere else. Felt a bit disappointment.
reply_text: Treatment is given after proper research....fees is included consultation,  procedure & plaster material...if u hav fees problem u should cleared before treatment...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Quick, Prompt, friendly and not excessive intrusion, he was busy at the appointed time and called me up to reschedule and then he kept his time without making me wait. He dealt with issue at hand the best and professional way he could. Now we have to wait for two weeks for the bone to heal and then we will know if it is value for time and money.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
I had a 1 PM appointment. The doctor turned up right on time and he was very friendly. Did a detailed examination and took the time to explain the problem. ****** ******* **** *********** ***** *** ******

It has been 3 days since meeting him. I have significant relief from my problem (muscular spasm) and the pain has mostly gone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Shantanu is very friendly *** ***** *** ******* **** *****  He is very confident in diagnosis and prescribes appropriate treatment . He explains  and communicates to patients in simple understandable terms.
Due to his timely and correct advise ,my daughter recovered from thigh bone fracture.
Thanks Dr Shantanu !

tags: Value for money,
review: I was quite glad to find a doctor on a Sunday to treat my wife’s sprained foot. However the billing process was a bit suspicious. Firstly the doctor said that they don’t accept Cashless and that I will need to get it reimbursed from practo. Also the plaster that he applied seemed a bit inflated cost wise. Earlier I was not being given a bill and was quoted 4400/- and when I insisted for a bill they hiked it to 4800/- with no break up of costs of plaster material. The date was also marked incorrectly on the bill whereas it was correct on the prescription. These kinds of issues (might be harmless) however draw suspicion.
reply_text: Cleared u everything....I given bill with breakup...bill was not hiked it was 4700...don't misguide....thanks....

tags: None
review: He is very patient listener. Reviews 360 degree of body movements before advising the medication. He understands the patient history over a period of time. He is also available on Sundays when most of the Doctor s are not availab.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,

joe Loob

review:
Excellent service, 
Trust worthy doctor.

I always feel like I get plenty of time to explain my issues without feeling rushed. I've managed to get in to be seen within a timely manner even without an appointment. The staff is great and the doctor Mr. Shantanu kundgir have fabulous bedside manners. I'm very impressed with this facility.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Shantanu is friendly and listen to the problem and show required empathy. My toe got fractured and i was going through severe pain. Doctor had given medicine and plastered my foot. After taking 2 days of medicine, my pain reduced drastically and i don't get any discomfort from my plaster as he has done his job perfectly. 
I recommend Dr Shantanu to all those who for looking for good orthopedic.
Thank you Doctor!
